body_html:
@phg1024, your fixes in the code helped with some errors. Now I get the following errors:

"C:\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\tf_python_build_pip_package.vcxproj" (default target) (1) ->
"C:\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\pywrap_tensorflow_internal.vcxproj" (default target) (3) ->
"C:\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\tf_core_gpu_kernels.vcxproj" (default target) (129) ->
(CustomBuild target) ->
  C:/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/kernels/bias_op_gpu.cu.cc(178): error : identifier "__syncwarp" is undefined [C:\tensor
flow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\tf_core_gpu_kernels.vcxproj]
  C:/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/kernels/bias_op_gpu.cu.cc(178): error : identifier "__syncwarp" is undefined [C:\tensor
flow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\tf_core_gpu_kernels.vcxproj]
  C:/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/kernels/bias_op_gpu.cu.cc(178): error : identifier "__syncwarp" is undefined [C:\tensor
flow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\tf_core_gpu_kernels.vcxproj]

Also I don't understand yet how "Building a standalone C++ Tensorflow program on Windows" hints can help to build python package.

body:
@phg1024, your fixes in the code helped with some errors. Now I get the following errors:

```
"C:\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\tf_python_build_pip_package.vcxproj" (default target) (1) ->
"C:\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\pywrap_tensorflow_internal.vcxproj" (default target) (3) ->
"C:\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\tf_core_gpu_kernels.vcxproj" (default target) (129) ->
(CustomBuild target) ->
  C:/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/kernels/bias_op_gpu.cu.cc(178): error : identifier "__syncwarp" is undefined [C:\tensor
flow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\tf_core_gpu_kernels.vcxproj]
  C:/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/kernels/bias_op_gpu.cu.cc(178): error : identifier "__syncwarp" is undefined [C:\tensor
flow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\tf_core_gpu_kernels.vcxproj]
  C:/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/kernels/bias_op_gpu.cu.cc(178): error : identifier "__syncwarp" is undefined [C:\tensor
flow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\tf_core_gpu_kernels.vcxproj]
```
Also I don't understand yet how "Building a standalone C++ Tensorflow program on Windows" hints can help to build python package.
